title: please help
body:
i can't log in to my second e-mail
i didn't forget my username or password but it keep saying wrong password or wrong username
i don't know what to do cause i forgot my registration e-mail

replies.body:
It sounds like you can't access your second *account*. If this is the case, you can reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll have an account recovery specialist assist you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
